message: When you first open a topic, it would be nice to see the first reply, as that often gives you a good idea of what the topic's about. Of course, that depends on whether you want to more closely emulate discussion boards, where the OP is likely to contain relevant information, or IRC, where there rarely is a concrete topic. It's especially relevant for topics in the feedback group.
+1 Perhaps with a little "close button" so that you can hide it if you want when opening the discussion a second time.
